CHAT.comment: MEADWESTVACO CORPORTATION, SUCCESSOR IN INTEREST TO THE MEAD CORPORATION, Petitioner v. ILLINOIS DEPARTMENT OF REVENUE, ET AL.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 11:17 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF BETH S. BRINKMANN ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
ORAL ARGUMENT OF BRIAN F. BAROV ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENTS
(Whereupon, at 12:18 p.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
